## Summary
Provide a short, clear description of the change and the motivation.

## Related issues
Link or reference related issues/PRs (e.g. Closes #123).

## How to test
1. Install deps: `npm install`
2. Build/type-check: `npm run build`
3. Run dev and verify: `npm run dev` -> open http://localhost:5173 and exercise changed routes/pages

## Checklist (required)
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds (type-check passes)
- [ ] Verified changed routes/pages in dev server
- [ ] Documentation updated if behavior or public API changed
- [ ] Tests added/updated where applicable
- [ ] Did not edit generated files (e.g. `src/routeTree.gen.ts`)
- [ ] PR is small and focused (split large changes)

## Notes
Any additional migration steps, compatibility notes, screenshots, or explanation.
